title: SBI classifies MTNL loan a/c as sub-standard NPA; threatens legal action
description: State Bank of India classified MTNL's loan accounts as sub-standard non-performing assets due to non-payment since June 30. With a total outstanding of Rs 325.52 crore, SBI warned legal actions if dues remain unpaid, while MTNL seeks government assistance for debt clearance.
